title: [Network Upgrade] Introduce a 6th pool for LM using 3pool YDV vault
body:
Overview: Make YDV vaults more enticing by introducing a 6th pool using YDV LP tokens from the 3pool Vault.

Yes = in favor, Rally team will add the 6th pool
No = not in favor, Rally team will not add the 6th pool

Discourse with more detail: https://forum.rally.io/t/making-ydvs-more-rewarding/61
author: 0x565B93a15d38aCD79c120b15432D21E21eD274d6
